thumb.name: Wedding Shower Gift
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFor You.%3Cbr%3EAlicia and Kevin%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EA Wedding%3Cbr%3EShower Gift%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWarmest wishes%3Cbr%3Eto both of you%3Cbr%3Efor a wonderful wedding%3Cbr%3Eand a bright and happy future together.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ECongratulations

thumb.name: Two Hearts Are One Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMichael and Jane%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ELove makes two hearts one.%3Cbr%3ECongratulations

thumb.name: God Keep You as One
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMelissa and Matt.%3Cbr%3Ethere is%3Cbr%3Ea guiding%3Cbr%3Ehand%3Cbr%3Ethat brings you%3Cbr%3Etogether%3Cbr%3Etoday%3Cbr%3Eto make%3Cbr%3Ethe two of you%3Cbr%3Eone...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...a caring.%3Cbr%3Eloving God%3Cbr%3Ewho blesses%3Cbr%3Eyour wedding%3Cbr%3Ewith celebration.%3Cbr%3Eand your marriage%3Cbr%3Ewith the promise%3Cbr%3Eof happiness.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EAs you journey together%3Cbr%3Ethrough each tomorrow.%3Cbr%3Elet His spirit continue%3Cbr%3Eto inspire and direct you%3Cbr%3Eand keep you%3Cbr%3Eforever as one.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ECongratulations%3Cbr%3Eand God's Blessing%3Cbr%3Eon Your Marriage%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: This Is Love
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ESteve and Kathy...%3Cbr%3Esharing. caring.%3Cbr%3Emaking each other%3Cbr%3Ehappy --%3Cbr%3Ethis is love.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EBest wishes%3Cbr%3Efor a happy married life.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Just Married
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3ECongratulations. Bill and Amy!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EHere's to a beautiful forever.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: For Our Son and Daughter-in-law
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ETo Our Son%3Cbr%3Eand Daughter-in-law%3Cbr%3EAs You Begin Your Life Together%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ESue and Tony...%3Cbr%3EBe kind.%3Cbr%3EBe patient.%3Cbr%3EBe open.%3Cbr%3EBe generous --%3Cbr%3Eand love one another%3Cbr%3Ewith all your heart%3Cbr%3Eand soul.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMay you always%3Cbr%3Ekeep in your hearts%3Cbr%3Ethe excitement and love%3Cbr%3Eyou feel today.%3Cbr%3Efor no joy is greater%3Cbr%3Ethan that which you share%3Cbr%3Eas you begin%3Cbr%3Eyour new life together.

thumb.name: For Daughter and 'Son'
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFor Our%3Cbr%3EDaughter and 'Son'.%3Cbr%3ENicole and Michael%3Cbr%3EWith Love%3Cbr%3EAs You%3Cbr%3EAre Married%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFor Our Daughter...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EIn our hearts we keep the memories%3Cbr%3Ewe'll always have of you.%3Cbr%3EThe sweet times we remember%3Cbr%3Eas you changed and learned and grew.%3Cbr%3EIn our hearts we keep the pride we feel%3Cbr%3Eat what our eyes now see --%3Cbr%3EA woman who has filled our years%3Cbr%3Eand our lives so happily.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFor Our%3Cbr%3EDaughter and 'Son'...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EIn our hearts we keep the two of you --%3Cbr%3Eour daughter. our new son --%3Cbr%3EAnd our wishes that your future%3Cbr%3Eis a bright. fulfilling one.%3Cbr%3EIn our hearts we keep our joy for you.%3Cbr%3Efor as your marriage starts.%3Cbr%3EThere's more love for you than ever%3Cbr%3Ein our thoughts and in our hearts.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ECongratulations
